name: Eating
description: Well, everybody needs to eat. So let's track every time you eat something.

name: Drikng water
description: Drinking water is very important. Keep track of every time you drink water (beer does not count!).

name: Sleep at least 8 hours
description: A good time sleep regenerates body and mind. Track each time you sleep at least 8 hours.

name: Sports for at least 30 minutes
description: Moving your body will keep it strong and healthy. Track each time you do any sport for at least 30 minutes.

name: Reading a book/paper/magazine for at least 10 minutes.
description: Reading a book will stimulate your brain and mind. Track each time you are reading a book, a paper or a magazine (physical copies) for at least 10 minutes.
